text: Extend inventory schema with VIN, year, length, weight, and chassis fields plus validation in schemas and services.
Add migration/backfill script to seed existing inventory records with default values for new spec fields to avoid validation breaks.
Enforce per-tenant VIN uniqueness on inventory create/update and return 409 errors on conflicts.
Restrict inventory condition to allowed states (new, used, demo, pending_sale) with schema enums and list filtering.
Add pricing breakdown fields (rebates, fees, taxes) and compute derived totalPrice in inventory responses.
Introduce location stock details (lot code, transferStatus, holdUntil) with validation and list filters.
Support inventory media extras (floorplans, virtualTours, videoLinks) with URL validation and persistence.
Expose GET /inventory/stats endpoint returning per-tenant aggregate stats using inventoryService.stats.
Include pagination metadata (limit, offset, total) in inventory list responses and align validation defaults.
Implement bulk inventory CSV import endpoint that validates rows and creates units per tenant with a summary report.
Add SEO fields to inventory (slug, metaTitle, metaDescription) with per-tenant slug uniqueness validation.
Create GET /inventory/slug/:slug endpoint to fetch inventory by slug for public detail pages.
Capture marketing attribution on leads (utmSource, utmMedium, utmCampaign, utmTerm, referrer) with validation and storage.
Add lead assignment field (assignedTo) with role validation and filtering in lead listings.
Track lead follow-up dates (dueDate, lastContactedAt) with ISO date validation and sortable listing support.
Log lead status and assignment changes to audit.log with requestId, actor, and before/after payloads.
Enforce valid lead status transitions (e.g., new→contacted→qualified→won/lost) with error codes on invalid hops.
Add dealership content pages CRUD (title, body, slug, meta) with tenant scoping and RBAC for admin/marketing roles.
Generate sitemap endpoint combining inventory slugs and content page slugs for SEO consumption.
Implement /events endpoint to record marketing events (search, view, lead_submit) with schema validation and tenant scoping.
Add daily rollup service summarizing events and leads for dashboard KPIs exposed via /metrics or dedicated endpoint.
Add login-specific rate limiter with exponential backoff per IP to mitigate credential stuffing.
Detect refresh token reuse and maintain a blacklist/store of revoked tokens to block replay.
Capture request latency and status metrics per route and expose aggregates in /metrics output.
Enhance /health to verify data directory writability and return tenant counts for readiness checks.
Cache capability list responses with in-memory TTL and manual invalidation hook to reduce repeated reads.
Set up Jest test runner with npm test script and base configuration for unit/integration tests.
Add unit tests for inventory service filters and VIN uniqueness constraints using seeded fixtures.
Add integration tests for auth + CSRF flow covering login, refresh rotation, and protected route access.
Document multi-tenant auth, CSRF expectations, and header requirements in README for API consumers.
Add developer runbook for bulk import workflow including sample CSV layout and troubleshooting steps.
